title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

int lower_bound(vector<int>& nums, int target) {	int left = 0, right = nums.size();	while(left < right){		int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;		if(nums[mid] < target) {			left = mid + 1;		} else {			right = mid;		}	}	return left;}int upper_bound(vector<int>& nums, int target) {	int left = 0, right = nums.size();	while(left < right) {		int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;		if (nums[mid] <= target) {			left = mid + 1;		} else {			right = mid;		}	}	return left;}
